title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.9 - Manager to be combatant's exclusive representative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.9 - Manager to be combatant's exclusive representative

State Regulations

All professional contact with a boxer or mixed martial artist
who is represented by a manager shall be through the manager of record, and no
one is permitted to negotiate or work to broker future matches or exhibitions
with a boxer or mixed martial artist who is represented by a manager without
the written consent of the manager of record, which shall be filed with the

Commission within three business days of its execution and the approval of the

Commission, except as otherwise directed or authorized by the

Commission. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
